item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "I love those who yearn for the impossible." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A man who won't die for something is not fit to live." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Elizabeth Cady Stanton
item.description: "Woman's degradation is in mans idea of his sexual rights. Our religion, laws, customs, are all founded on the belief that woman was made for man." -- Elizabeth Cady Stanton

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Barack Obama
(B) Archer add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We love the things we love for what they are." -- Robert Frost

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Trisha Yearwood
item.description: "What's meant to be will always find a way" -- Trisha Yearwood

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Richard Evans
item.description: "It is often in the darkest skies that we see the brightest stars." -- Richard Evans

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Benjamin Disraeli
item.description: "There are three types of lies -- lies, damn lies, and statistics." -- Benjamin Disraeli

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "One should never trust a woman who tells one her real age. A woman who would tell one that would tell one anything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: (B) Archer add a quote by Benjamin Disraeli
item.description: "When men are pure, laws are useless; when men are corrupt, laws are broken." -- Benjamin Disraeli
